title: Coronation Street spoilers: Huge character shot dead on Christmas Day
text:
You can usually rely on Coronation Street to provide some love and warmth at Christmas time but the slapstick humour, mistletoe kisses and piano sing songs are set to be replaced by a deadly armed siege this year – with a main character set to die.

Michelle Connor (Kym Marsh) is planning to confront her cheating husband Robert Preston (Tristan Gemmill) over his double life on their wedding day but even she didn’t want her revenge to end in his death.

In reports which have surfaced over the weekend, Derek – the man who went into business with Gary Windass (Mikey North) but was then warned off after getting close to Izzy Armstrong (Cherylee Houston) – will return after feeling scammed out of the factory by him.

Armed with a gun, he is set to tackle Gary in a series of events that seems set to coincide with Michelle and Robert’s wedding party. Cast have recently been seen filming with fairground attractions including a helter skelter but a fun celebratroy day will end in bloodshed.

The Sun reports that Robert will be shot – as will another character – but for the doomed groom, it will be the last hurrah as he will supposedly die from a heart attack on his way to the hospital.

A source told the outlet: ‘Derek gets drunk and starts waving a gun around the pub. There’s a tense stand-off then a massive fight between the two men and two people are shot, including Robert, who dies on Christmas Day.

‘He makes it to hospital but suffers a heart attack and dies off-screen in a bit of snub to Tristan. It’s left to Michelle to tell everyone he’s dead.’

Tristan’s exit from the role is set to lead to a goodbye for Kym Marsh’s Michelle although it is all but confirmed that the https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XLupK29UXmkdoor will be left open for a future return for her down the line.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Coronation Street but they don’t comment on future storylines.
